[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@influxdata/influxdb3-client](./influxdb3-client.md) &gt; [Transport](./influxdb3-client.transport.md) &gt; [request](./influxdb3-client.transport.request.md)

## Transport.request() method

Sends data to the server and receives decoded result. The type of the result depends on response's content-type (deserialized json, text).

**Signature:**

```typescript
request(path: string, requestBody: any, options: SendOptions, responseStarted?: ResponseStartedFn): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | HTTP request path |
|  requestBody | any | request body |
|  options | [SendOptions](./influxdb3-client.sendoptions.md) | send options |
|  responseStarted | [ResponseStartedFn](./influxdb3-client.responsestartedfn.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;

response data
